channel.title: R Markdown on Mike Treglia
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on Mike Treglia

item.title: Getting Going with Blogdown & Hugo
item.description: Why Blogdown? As I’ve noted before, my previous website was pretty basic. While it was largely simple to make updates, it wasn’t particularly elegant. It was functional, and definitely looked reasonable when it was first created. Editing it wasn’t too difficult, but took some forethought if I wanted to make updates across the website. I’m not at all trained in web development, and just I picked up a few things by working off a template a friend created for me, and toying around with some .
